mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zixun_name as zixunName ,a.zixun_types as zixunTypes ,a.zixun_photo as zixunPhoto ,a.zixun_file as zixunFile ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.zixun_content as zixunContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM zixun a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.zixun_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunName},'%')
and a.zixun_types = #{params.zixunTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.zixun_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
